query:
SELECT g.id AS id,
                  g.name AS name, 
                  SUM(s.playtime) AS playtime, 
                  MAX(s.last_launch) AS last_launch,
                  COALESCE(MIN(s.is_archived), 0) AS is_archived
            FROM games g 
            LEFT JOIN subgames s ON g.id = s.parent
            GROUP BY g.id, g.name
